dcterms:creator: M. Li
L. Cui
S. Huang
F. Wei
M. Zhou
Z. Li
dcterms:description: A prominent dataset in the field of document analysis, comprising 417,000 document images annotated via a process of crawling the arXiv database. It categorizes tables into three types: LaTeX images, Word images, and a combined set, providing data for table structure recognition.
dcterms:title: TableBank

dcterms:creator: X. Zhong
J. Tang
A. J. Yepes
dcterms:description: A sizable dataset in the public domain encompassing 335,703 images for training, 11,240 for validation, and 11,405 for testing, featuring annotations like polygonal segmentation and bounding boxes for figures, lists, titles, tables, and texts in images sourced from research papers and articles.
dcterms:title: PubLayNet

dcterms:creator: B. Smock
R. Pesala
R. Abraham
dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset featuring nearly one million tables, specifically tailored for table detection in scientific documents, with extensive annotations including precise location information crucial for accurately detecting tables within diverse documents.
dcterms:title: PubTables

dcterms:creator: L. Gao
Y. Huang
H. DÂ´ejean
J.-L. Meunier
Q. Yan
Y. Fang
F. Kleber
E. Lang
dcterms:description: The ICDAR 2019 competition for Table Detection and Recognition introduced two novel datasets for the table detection task, facilitating direct comparisons with previous methods.
dcterms:title: ICDAR-19
